--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup: Fine, Yggdrasil. My old Dinobot buddy took care of it. Things 
are confusing here. I think this Quet just took command from Scourge.
> 
> Kup releases four shots at Scourge.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: I also think this is too much. I'd like to post and make Yggie 
do
> something significant, but unfortunately, I couldn't because of the
> huge pile of posts. I'd like that every player tries to keep the
> others in mind and post a little less often at the profit of quality
> in the posts.
> 
> Bic:
> 
> Yggdrasil lifted his head above the edge of his shield. He had been
> oblivious to his surroundings until Kup had sounded retreat. He was
> not happy at leaving the Ark in Pred hands, and someone would know 
that.
> 
> Then, Scourge fired upon Kup and Jackie...
> 
> Yggdrasil: Kup! Jackie! You guys okay?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > OOC: URGH!  What is it with people always having to blitz-post 
around 
> > here?  I thought there was an agreement to put a lid on it!  
Maybe I 
> > should leave after all - certainly there's no shortage of other 
RPG's 
> > that actually respect members who can't be online 24-7!!!!!!
> > 
> > Empath/Wheeljack-X::
> > 
> > Having taken to the air to avoid Kup's fire earlier, Empath now 
lands 
> > right in his face.  "What's the big idea, Auto-bloke?  If I 
hadn't 
> > shorted out Teletran-1, it would've toasted you by now!  Or were 
you 
> > too busy shooting at me to notice it was shooting at you?"
> >

> > pushing the two apart.
